title.narrative: 3.2 - QUALITY BASIC EDUCATION

description.narrative: 3.2-The Ministry of Education has increased capacity to provide quality basic education (grades 1-8) especially for the most disadvantaged children including those with disabilities, those who do not speak Nepali language at home, and in remote areas

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: 3.2-The Ministry of Education has increased capacity to provide quality basic education (grades 1-8) especially for the most disadvantaged children including those with disabilities, those who do not speak Nepali language at home, and in remote areas

description.narrative: UNICEF and partners have started new activities in 327 schools to reach approximately 30,000 children with Early Grade Learning interventions. Activities were designed based on lessons learned and positive outcomes from earlier phases of successful Early Grade Reading and inclusive education interventions. Particular emphasis is placed on supporting and modeling good practices for small and remote schools, for mother tongue education, and scaling up inclusive education for children with disabilities in 16 municipalities in provinces 2, 6, and 7. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:10/12/2019

title.narrative: Number of schools providing instruction in mother tongue in grades 1-3 with UNICEF support
Number of small schools (<100 students) that received support from UNICEF through child-friendly school model
Number of schools with UNICEF support using materials that support the inclusion of children with disabilities
Number of schools with UNICEF support using materials that support the inclusion of children with disabilities

System Strengthening - Availability, in schools supported by UNICEF, of quality CFS/CFE standards that are consistent with Child Friendly Schools/education or similar models - score (1-4), see guidance
System Strengthening - Multilingual Ed. - Availability of sufficient human and material resources support mother tongue/multilingual education - score (1-4), see guidance
System Strengthening - Multilingual Ed. - Community engagement in multilingual / mother-tongue education - score (1-4), see guidance
System Strengthening - Inclusive Ed. - Availability of materials and communication that support the inclusion of children with disabilities - score (1-4), see guidance
System Strengthening - Inclusive Ed. - Existence of appropriate law/policy explicitly mentioning the rights of children with disabilities to receive an education - score (1-4), see guidance
